solution_line_template: They sold ${car_sales_revenue} worth of cars each month because {num_cars_made} x {car_sale_price} = <<{num_cars_made}*{car_sale_price}={car_sales_revenue}>>{car_sales_revenue}
They made ${car_profit} a month off cars because {car_sales_revenue} - {car_materials_cost} = <<{car_sales_revenue}-{car_materials_cost}={car_profit}>>{car_profit}

They sold ${motorcycle_sales_revenue} worth of motorcycles each month because {num_motorcycles_sold} x {motorcycle_sale_price} = <<{num_motorcycles_sold}*{motorcycle_sale_price}={motorcycle_sales_revenue}>>{motorcycle_sales_revenue}

They make ${motorcycle_profit} a month off motorcycles because {motorcycle_sales_revenue} - {motorcycle_materials_cost} = <<{motorcycle_sales_revenue}-{motorcycle_materials_cost}={motorcycle_profit}>>{motorcycle_profit}
They make ${profit_difference} more a month off motorcycles than cars because {motorcycle_profit} - {car_profit} = <<{motorcycle_profit}-{car_profit}={profit_difference}>>{profit_difference}
